text: Am I the only one having a problem with the icon change? I have used lots of versions of the same image I'm trying to set as the programs icon. The icon was made using an online pixel editor, default transparent backgrounds don't work so I decided to install gimp but, the same problem occurs; either the image is oddly colored or the image is a block of black pixels in a square.  I've followed you're/sentdex's example when changing the background for all versions for all sizes: 32,16 and above, can anyone  help? it does display but not as it should, also I checked to make sure I'm using the same settings as in the example and still nothing.
